Articles.Content: We are told the stupidity and courage of the Kerbals that we can hire, but not if they are badass. So, I simply suggest that we are also given that information as well. I'd love to hire some badass pilots, and only hire badass pilots.
I think that only Jebediah Kerman is badass. No other Kerbal (or human) comes close to his awesomeness. Except Chuck Norris.
